user_features.csv.description: User behavior and preference features for recommendation systems

features.total_tracks: Total number of tracks listened to
features.unique_artists_count: Number of unique artists listened to
features.unique_albums_count: Number of unique albums listened to
features.music_diversity: Artist diversity score (unique artists / total tracks)

track_features.csv.description: Track content features for content-based filtering

features.popularity_score: Number of times track was played
features.avg_completion_rate: Average completion rate across all users
features.unique_listeners_count: Number of unique users who played this track
features.track_age_days: Days since first play in dataset

user_track_interactions.csv.description: User-track interaction matrix for collaborative filtering

features.play_count: Number of times user played this track
features.engagement_score: Weighted score based on plays and completion rate

temporal_listening_patterns.csv.description: Time-aware listening data for temporal recommendation models

features.temporal_features: Hour, day of week, weekend flag
